overview: For Ferdiandra Putra, art is a safe space to explore.  He takes inspiration from cats, pop culture, and nightmares that disturb his sleep.  Through art, Ferdi, who is always supported by his parents, tries to overcome the stigma caused by his Asperger's condition.  In the near future he will hold his first solo exhibition, realizing his dream of becoming an artist.
title: Scene From The Unseen
